scripts.say: Port - Exercise Area
In this exercise scenario, our fleet will ambush another fleet led by the Commander.
As I'm sure you all know, this will be similar to the friendly spars we've had with the Royal Navy and Eagle Union in the past; it is merely an exercise.

However, its goal isn't solely for our fleet to gain more experience; it's also meant to strengthen bonds among factions, and more importantly, to expose us to different combat formations and unexpected scenarios.
And so, as per Mikasa's advice, I shall serve as the commander of the Sakura Fleet since I have not become a full-fledged member of this naval base yet.
I'm sure many of you who have never seen me before are confused or upset by this decision.
But I, Battleship Suruga, promise to dedicate my body and spirit to carry out this task!
Now, let's get ourselves ready and see this exercise through to the end!
That was a rousing speech, Suruga. I knew it wasn't a mistake to summon you here.
Thank you. I shall give it my all to ensure that this joint exercise is conducted successfully.
Of course. For this exercise, you are the one in charge, not me. I trust that you will be able to fully display the Sakura Fleet's majesty and honor to the Commander.
Next, I shall announce our combat strategy and formations...
Wa ha hah! Just call upon Yukikaze the Great, and Commander's fleet will fall in the blink of an eye!
We can't have that happening. I have waited for this exercise for so long, and I want to truly savor each moment as my Commander's opponent.
Suruga, would you please have me deployed to the area where my dear Commander will be waiting for me?
I will take it into consideration. I'm aware this is simply an exercise, but my deployment decisions must be based on logic and take the mission's goal into account...
Hmm, very well. We must do our best for my Commander, after all.
I hate to admit it, but this fleet is called the Suruga Fleet, not the Yukikaze Fleet... so just this once, I'll follow your orders, Suruga!
R-right... I shall do everything that I can...
Sorry for putting you through all this trouble.
